<!-- Use this file to provide workspace-specific custom instructions to Copilot. -->

This is a React Native Expo app called 'Leeway' - an AI-powered interior design agent.

## Project Structure
- **src/components**: Reusable UI elements
- **src/screens**: Main application views
- **src/services**: API integrations (Gemini AI)
- **src/types**: TypeScript interfaces and type definitions

## Tech Stack
- React Native with Expo
- TypeScript
- NativeWind (Tailwind CSS)
- Expo Camera & Media Library
- Google Generative AI

## Development Guidelines
- Follow strict folder structure with all components in src/
- Use TypeScript for all files
- Apply NativeWind classes for styling
- Keep API logic in services directory
- Define all interfaces in types directory
